6 float freq = 0;

9 void conf_callback(calib::RegistrationConfig &config, uint32_t level)
10 {
11  freq = config.freq;
12  switch(config.logger)
13  {
14  case 0:
15  if (ros::console::set_logger_level(ROSCONSOLE_DEFAULT_NAME, ros::console::levels::Debug))
16  {
17  ros::console::notifyLoggerLevelsChanged();
18  }
19  break;
20  case 2:
21  if (ros::console::set_logger_level(ROSCONSOLE_DEFAULT_NAME, ros::console::levels::Warn))
22  {
23  ros::console::notifyLoggerLevelsChanged();
24  }
25  break;
26  case 3:
27  if (ros::console::set_logger_level(ROSCONSOLE_DEFAULT_NAME, ros::console::levels::Fatal))
28  {
29  ros::console::notifyLoggerLevelsChanged();
30  }
31  break;
32  default:
33  if (ros::console::set_logger_level(ROSCONSOLE_DEFAULT_NAME, ros::console::levels::Info))
34  {
35  ros::console::notifyLoggerLevelsChanged();
36  }
37  }
38 }
39 
40 void pc_callback(const pcConstPtr& pc1, const pcConstPtr& pc2)
41 {
42  pc_t input1 = *pc1;
43  pc_t input2 = *pc2;
44  pc_t merged = input1 + input2;
45  pub.publish(merged);
46 }
47 
48 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
49 {
51 // init
52 
53  string node_name = (string) "registration_node";
54  ros::init(argc, argv, node_name);
55  ros::NodeHandle nh("/calib/registration");
56  ros::NodeHandle node_cam1("/calib/cam1");
57  ros::NodeHandle node_cam2("/calib/cam2");
58  ros::NodeHandle node_match("/calib/match");
59  ros::NodeHandle node_scene("/calib/scene");
60  if (ros::console::set_logger_level(ROSCONSOLE_DEFAULT_NAME, ros::console::levels::Info))
61  {
62  ros::console::notifyLoggerLevelsChanged();
63  }
64 
65  dynamic_reconfigure::Server<calib::RegistrationConfig> server(nh);
66  dynamic_reconfigure::Server<calib::RegistrationConfig>::CallbackType f;
67  f = boost::bind(&conf_callback, _1, _2);
68  server.setCallback(f);
69 
70  pub = nh.advertise<pc_msg_t>("/calib/clouds/scene", 1);
71 
72  message_filters::Subscriber<pc_t> cam1_sub(nh, "/calib/clouds/cam1", 1);
73  message_filters::Subscriber<pc_t> cam2_sub(nh, "/calib/clouds/cam2", 1);
74  typedef sync_policies::ApproximateTime<pc_t, pc_t> KinectSync;
75  Synchronizer<KinectSync> sync(KinectSync(1), cam1_sub, cam2_sub);
76  sync.registerCallback(boost::bind(&pc_callback, _1, _2));
77 
79 // main code
80 
81  Cloud cam1(&node_cam1, "/cam1/qhd/points", "cam1");
82  dynamic_reconfigure::Server<calib::CloudConfig> server_cam1(node_cam1);
83  dynamic_reconfigure::Server<calib::CloudConfig>::CallbackType f_cam1;
84  f_cam1 = boost::bind(&Cloud::conf_callback, &cam1, _1, _2);
85  server_cam1.setCallback(f_cam1);
86 
87  Cloud cam2(&node_cam2, "/cam2/qhd/points", "cam2");
88  dynamic_reconfigure::Server<calib::CloudConfig> server_cam2(node_cam2);
89  dynamic_reconfigure::Server<calib::CloudConfig>::CallbackType f_cam2;
90  f_cam2 = boost::bind(&Cloud::conf_callback, &cam2, _1, _2);
91  server_cam2.setCallback(f_cam2);
92 
93  Merging match(&node_match, "cam1", "cam2");
94  dynamic_reconfigure::Server<calib::MergingConfig> server_merging(node_match);
95  dynamic_reconfigure::Server<calib::MergingConfig>::CallbackType f_match;
96  f_match = boost::bind(&Merging::conf_callback, &match, _1, _2);
97  server_merging.setCallback(f_match);
98 
99  Cloud scene(&node_cam2, "/calib/clouds/scene", "scene");
100  dynamic_reconfigure::Server<calib::CloudConfig> server_scene(node_scene);
101  dynamic_reconfigure::Server<calib::CloudConfig>::CallbackType f_scene;
102  f_scene = boost::bind(&Cloud::conf_callback, &scene, _1, _2);
103  server_scene.setCallback(f_scene);
104 
106 // ros loop
107 
108  while (ros::ok())
109  {
110  if (freq > 0)
111  {
112  ros::Rate loop_rate(freq);
113  ros::spinOnce();
114  loop_rate.sleep();
115  }
116  else
117  {
118  ros::spin();
119  }
120  }
121 
122  return 0;
124 }
